text: Jonathan Aris (born 24 January 1971) is a British actor who has appeared in films, television and the theatre. Aris has narrated three TV documentaries, all of which were produced and aired by the National Geographic Channel. These include Air Crash Investigation in the UK, Trapped (two episodes only), and Microkillers. He also appears as Philip Anderson in the BBC television series Sherlock. He appeared in The Night Manager. In 2016, he appeared in Tutankhamun as the American Egyptologist Herbert Winlock.
